title: Academic Discourse and Symposia
description: Participating in high-level academic discussions and conferences

exercises.title: Presenting Research Findings
exercises.instruction: Practice the structure and language of academic paper presentations

opening: I want to thank the organizers for the opportunity to share this work.
Today I'll be presenting findings from a study that examines...
My aim is to contribute to ongoing conversations about...
contextualizing: This research emerges from a broader inquiry into...
My work builds on and extends scholarship by...
The question I want to address has implications for...
presenting_argument: I want to advance three claims today...
I will argue that previous accounts have overlooked...
closing: In closing, I want to emphasize the provisional nature of these findings.
I look forward to your questions and the opportunity to think together about these issues.
This research opens several avenues for further inquiry, particularly...

exercises.title: Making Scholarly Interventions
exercises.instruction: Learn to position your contribution within existing debates

moves.name: The corrective
moves.description: Identify a gap or error in existing scholarship
moves.example: While scholarship has thoroughly examined X, it has largely neglected the significance of Y.

moves.name: The synthesis
moves.example: By bringing insights from literary studies into dialogue with cognitive science, we can develop a richer understanding of...

moves.name: The paradigm challenge
moves.example: I want to suggest that our very framing of this problem is what prevents progress. Rather than asking X, we should be asking Y.

moves.name: The case study
moves.description: Use a specific example to illuminate broader issues
moves.example: This particular text, while seemingly marginal, reveals tensions that are constitutive of the entire genre.

exercises.title: Disagreeing Respectfully
exercises.instruction: Practice expressing disagreement in academic contexts

phrases: I take your point about X, but I wonder whether it fully accounts for...
There's much to admire in this analysis, though I'm not yet persuaded that...
I'm sympathetic to this reading, but it seems to me that...
I want to make sure I understand your claim correctly. Are you suggesting that...?
Could you say more about how you're using the term X? I wonder if we might mean different things by it.
Help me understand how this squares with...
I'm curious about the archive you've constructed. How do you account for...?
What would count as evidence against this thesis?
Is there a risk that this framework is confirming what we already expect to find?

exercises.title: Responding to Critique
exercises.instruction: Practice receiving and responding to scholarly criticism graciously
exercises.scenario: A questioner has challenged a fundamental assumption in your presentation

acknowledging: That's a really generative challenge, and I think you've identified a tension I haven't fully resolved.
You've put your finger on exactly the issue that has given me the most trouble in this project.
clarifying: I think there may be a misunderstanding about my claim. Let me try to state it more precisely...
My argument is perhaps more modest than it appeared. I'm not claiming X, but rather...
engaging: That's an interesting counter-example. Let me think through how it might relate to my framework...
I think that objection would be decisive if my argument depended on X. But my claim is actually...
deferring: That's a question I don't have a satisfying answer to yet, and I think it points to where this project needs to go next.
You've raised something that deserves more attention than I can give it in the time remaining. Might we continue this conversation afterward?
